about_the_game:
Seventeen original songs composed and recorded for Malkin, as well as one modern rendition of the ballad “Now Wolde y Fayne.” Banjo, guitar, synth, vocals, and the occasional piano chord produce atmospheric melodies. Perfect for strange tasks and forlorn places.

Includes the non-instrumental version of "Drawn Swords" (the song played at the Bonnyjoy).

legal_notice:
All songs written, performed, and recorded by Zach Holbrook except "Now Wolde y Fayne," which is his arrangement of a traditional medieval song. Instruments used: synth, banjo, lute guitar, voice, keyboard.
